text.text:
It pays to be beautiful.

Create stunning mobile apps with business impact.

promo.productIntroText: Find out how Adobe Experience Manager can help your business.

mmarquee.text:
It pays to be beautiful.

Create stunning mobile apps with business impact.

text_b78.text: Big things are happening on small screens.

text_e85a.text: Engaging customers. Empowering sales teams. Inspiring employees and students. Organizations are using Adobe Digital Publishing Solution to create amazing apps that tackle business challenges of all kinds, in every industry.

text_344.text: Angie’s List members come home for inspiration.

text_2645.text: The local service marketplace leader needed a product that would evolve \u0003with its mobile strategy. Digital Publishing Solution (DPS) powered the transition from a digital replica \u0003of its monthly print magazine to an interactive app experience that updates \u0003weekly. The renovation project paid for itself, with 670% audience growth \u0003and 75% of readers engaging again within two weeks.

text_508b.text: Learn more ›        See infographic ›        Watch video ›

text_e702.text: REI training app ensures every store has a perfect view.

text_52e1.text: To ensure their store displays look picture perfect, the outdoor retailer uses \u0003a training app to share visual merchandising guidelines with employees. REI \u0003designers found creating the app a breeze, and it had a mountain of business impact. All employees said they valued the app and 66% said it made them more efficient.

text_623b.text: Learn more ›        See infographic ›        Watch video ›

text_6d2f.text: Audi’s library app drives loyalty and leads.

text_556.text: Progressive design and engineering are in Audi’s DNA. So the automaker’s \u0003library app gives their tech-savvy customers an engaging brand experience \u0003that helps drive sales with a 3% click-through rate. And 91% of those clicks \u0003bring customers closer to a purchase, as they configure their dream car, \u0003search inventory, and request a quote.

text_889c.text: Learn more ›        See infographic ›

text_78e9.text: To engage students, alumni and faculty schooled in the digital age, UNC Kenan-Flagler Business School embraced mobile and replaced pricy print pieces with easy-to-create apps. It took just four weeks for designers to create a recruitment app for MBA students. And the work paid off with high marks — student applications increased by 28%.

text_3428.text: Watch video ›

text_ee85.text: Recruitment app fuels the search for top talent.

text_5637.text: To give job candidates a feel for what it’s like to work at a company that values innovation, ExxonMobil created a recruitment app. Since no coding was required, it took just three months to create — which saved barrels of time and expense. And the app has energized candidates, who spend more than 14 minutes engaging each day.

text_5740.text: Learn more ›        See infographic ›

text_83ab.text: Stryker apps are the backbone of sales support.

text_bb32.text: This leading medical technology firm gave its sales reps a more compelling way \u0003to engage busy physicians. Sales enablement apps now bring surgical products and \u0003techniques to life. The company moved away from expensive custom development, and in just two years achieved a 78% usage rate and a 56% reduction in print costs.

text_3fb5.text: Learn more ›        Watch video ›

text_36ab.text: The innovative media brand found fresh content and flexible publishing drove a 400% increase \u0003in monthly return visits.

text_7f1b.text: Learn more ›

text_ea4.text: “The ability to do all of this work in-house has been monumental. We completed app production quickly and affordably.” — Karl Shreeves, technical development executive

text_4570.text: Learn more ›

text_39dc.text: “This app has made our onboard sales team exponentially more productive while improving the booking experience for our guests.” — W. Alejandro Polanco, manager, Mobile & Web Engagement

text_2623.text: Learn more ›

text_4f5.text: The Buffalo Bills’ award-winning app scored with fans and doubled audience size with its real-time statistics, breaking news and game previews.

text_29c4.text: Learn more ›
